H0.text: Name the ingredients that make up that classic American favorite, the Big Mac. Double Cheeseburger

H1.text: Name the ingredients that make up that classic American favorite, the Big Mac. Special Sauce Burger

H2.text: Name the ingredients that make up that classic American favorite, the Big Mac. Beef and Cheese Sandwich

H3.text: Name the ingredients that make up that classic American favorite, the Big Mac. BigMac

A4.text: The Big Mac is made with two 1.6 oz (45 g) beef patties, a special sauce, shredded iceberg lettuce, one processed American cheese slice, two slices of dill pickle, and minced onions, served on a three slice sesame seed bun.

A5.text: The Big Mac sauce consists of store-bought mayonnaise, sweet pickle relish and yellow mustard whisked together with vinegar, garlic powder, onion powder and paprika.
